means: 排除，拒绝( exclude的现在分词)

sentence.Network_en: The shop opens seven days a week excluding Christmas Day.
sentence.Network_cn: 本商店每周七天营业,圣诞节除外.

sentence.Network_en: Five persons spoke at the meeting excluding me.
sentence.Network_cn: 除我以外,还有五个人在会上发了言.

sentence.Network_en: The families questioned, excluding those on income support, have a net income of £500.20 a week.
sentence.Network_cn: 除那些依靠收入补助金的家庭外，被调查的家庭每周的净收入是500.20英镑。

PerfectNetExp.abs: The price of the goods , excluding transportation , is not high ., 不计运费 , 这批货物的价格不高.
国际商务单证英语常见缩写 - 豆丁网 ... c.w.t.;cwt. hundredweight 英担 ex. excluding 除外; f.i. for instance 例如.
航海及海运专业词汇英语翻译(E) ... excluding 除外 excluding 扣除 exclusion clause 免责条款.
酒店英语词汇_百度文库 ... exchange 兑换, (货币)交换 excluding 不包括在内的 equivalent 相等的,相当的.

list.abs: fluid erosion 流体冲蚀fluid excluder 流体封隔器fluid extract 流体提出物
excitron 激励管excluder pigment 防锈颜料excluder 排除器
excluded property 除外财产excluded reserve 除外储备exclusive of rates 不包括差饷
Benjamin Chen - BenjaminC ... ex-cita trainee 技术员学徒 excluded works 除外工程 exclusive of rates 不包括差饷.

entry.def: You use excluding before mentioning a person or thing to show that you are not including them in your statement.

example.ex: The families questioned, excluding those on income support, have a net income of £500.20 a week...
example.tran: 除那些依靠收入补助金的家庭外，被调查的家庭每周的净收入是500.20英镑。

example.ex: Excluding water, half of the body's weight is protein.
example.tran: 除去水，蛋白质占了体重的一半。

auth_sentence.content: Cardiac syndrome X is usually diagnosed by excluding other conditions.
auth_sentence.res_content: Cardiac syndrome X is usually diagnosed by excluding other conditions.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Cardiac syndrome X is usually diagnosed by excluding other conditions.

auth_sentence.content: Credit card sales volume is presented excluding Commercial Card.
auth_sentence.res_content: Credit card sales volume is presented excluding Commercial Card.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Credit card sales volume is presented excluding Commercial Card.

auth_sentence.content: Bering reinforces old stereotypes by excluding data that would contradict them.
auth_sentence.res_content: Bering reinforces old stereotypes by excluding data that would contradict them.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Bering reinforces old stereotypes by excluding data that would contradict them.

Sentence.sentence: We use bonding humor to enhance our social connections* but we also may employ it as a way of excluding or rejecting an outsider

sentences.en: The shop is open seven days a week excluding Christmas Day.
sentences.cn: 本商店每周七天营业, 圣诞节除外。
